title: Looking for a support main who is in gold
body: Im a gold 4 adc main and I am looking for a support main to grind with during the school holidays. Dont have a mic so dont expect me to use discord or skype

replies.body: I dont see why you need a support duo if you dont have comms of any sort, seriously, if you want to try out the whoel adc supp duo thing, its way better to have a mic
sure why not we can see how it goes without a mic
